name: Don't Tell Him
description:
I made this short game to improve my skills in game development

I hope you've enjoyed it

if you need a good starting course in game development I highly recommend this one

https://www.udemy.com/course/unitycourse/

because I know how hard it is to learn everything by yourself without a good instruction

also, here's my Patreon if you want to support me on my journey

https://www.patreon.com/max109y
